name: Story Trigger
description:
Story Trigger asks "What if someone managed to get a gun in DnD?" and follows the natural conclusion that it would ruin everything.

Play as a brave hero or a heartless villain in this short narrative experience based on old interactive fiction games like Zork and Adventure.

Story Trigger was made from scratch in a little over a week for ShackNews Game Jam the Third. We hope you like it!
